main_definition: Mileage refers to the distance traveled over a certain amount of time, typically measured in miles per gallon (mpg) or kilometers per liter (km/L). It can also indicate efficiency or performance related to travel and transportation.

meanings_and_examples.example: The car's mileage is 30 miles per gallon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Efficiency of fuel consumption in vehicles
meanings_and_examples.example: This model has excellent mileage, averaging around 45 miles per gallon.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person's ability to travel long distances without frequent stops or rest
meanings_and_examples.example: Due to her high stamina and endurance, she can cover several thousand miles on a road trip.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The rate of progress made in achieving goals or completing tasks over time
meanings_and_examples.example: He is making good mileage with his work, finishing projects ahead of schedule.
